text: guys if you're looking to up your potato
salad game this summer why not give one
of our fresh new ideas with try today
I'm making a fresh and Irby potato salad
to start off I've cooked three pounds of
peewee potatoes are very very small new
potatoes until they're tender and I'm
just crushing them very lightly to open
them up a little bit so they can absorb
the dressing a little bit better don't
overdo it you're not making mashed
potatoes and they don't all have to be
crushed but a little bit of crushing
works great you can use a potato masher
if you want to to that add Wow still
warm right after draining two
tablespoons of red wine vinegar a half a
teaspoon of freshly grated lemon zest
and then two tablespoons of lemon juice
I'm doing this while the potatoes are
still warm
and that paired with that little bit of
crushing that I did of the potatoes is
going to allow the dressing to really
really absorb into the potatoes 3/4 of a
cup of extra virgin olive oil so this
potato salad does not have any
mayonnaise we do have a version with
mayonnaise in the issue though so you
check that one out salt and pepper
then you just toss and what you do is
you let this cool completely that should
take about 30 minutes at room
temperature and then I'm gonna add some
delicious fresh herbs so just let this
sit you can give it a stir every once in
a while but let it sit for about 30
minutes while you're waiting for your
potatoes to absorb all that delicious
flavor you can cut up some celery and
onion you'll need about a cup of diced
celery depending on the size of your
celery that can be from 2 or 3 stalks
these are pretty big so I think do it
okay
I also have a cup of chopped fresh herbs
this can be a combination of parsley the
leaves from the celery a little bit of
oregano whatever tastes good to you and
then on top of it some sweet onion you
can find a Vidalia and other sweet onion
like that you should use that about half
of an onion or a half a cup of chopped
onion our base recipe has some scallion
in it if you prefer to use scallion you
can use that and if you're using an
onion that's not a sweet onion a regular
onion you can soak it in some water for
a few minutes before you add it to the
salad to remove a little bit of that
bite that onion has
add your herbs to the cooled potatoes
add the onion celery stir it all up and
then salt and pepper
keep your potato salad in the
refrigerator until you're ready to eat
it this makes plenty for a party you can
certainly cut the recipe down if you
don't need to have this much but it's
going to disappear quickly I can
guarantee it
keep this in the refrigerator and serve
it at your next party you look super
duper happy gets better as it sits a
little bit so if you want to make it the
day ahead
[Music]
if you like recipes like this and you
want more make sure to click like and
subscribe because we have plenty more in
this game
